summary: A tough young boxer struggles to come out in England. Having travelled to London, from his smaller town, he meets and falls for a twenty-something music producer. But love doesn't come easy.
cast: Steve Bell|Ian Rose|Roger Daltrey|Dani Behr|Jude Alderson|Emile Charles|Chris Hargreaves|Paul Broughton|P.J. Nicholas|Sean Simpson|Charlie Caine|Stephen Burke|Dickon Tolson|Chris Ross|Tony Van Silva|Suzy King|Ursula Lea|Suzanne Hall|Jason Redshaw|Nigel Travis
title: Tal como es
